name: Sinister Evergreens
description:
In botany, an evergreen is a plant which has foliage that remains green and functional through more than one growing season.

Created for the DreadXP Found Footage Jam.

Controls
  • Arrow keys for movement
  • C to toggle CRT effect
  • F to toggle fullscreen
  • Ctrl+number to increase window size to that scale
  • Maybe more...
Credits

The name was inspired by something a friend said

All assets & code by me except where otherwise mentioned

Built with Godot

CRT shader by hiulit, used under MIT license, https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/749

Maze layout generated with https://www.dcode.fr/maze-generator
